content.html: Dave Bautista says he doesn’t think he could play Bane at this point in his career. “I just don't know if I could handle the physical part, and I don't think I would have the longevity to plan ahead for films.” (Source: insider.com/dave-bautista-…)
content.value:
Dave Bautista says he doesn’t think he could play Bane at this point in his career.

“I just don't know if I could handle the physical part, and I don't think I would have the longevity to plan ahead for films.”

(Source: insider.com/dave-bautista-…)
